price: And your god is one God. None has the right to be worshiped except Him – the Most Compassionate, the Most Merciful.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
